name: Cloudbabies
description:
Compatible devices - read more below...

Please Note
Cloudbabies is NOT currently compatible with these devices
iPad 1
iPod Touch 4th generation and below

Due to the memory constraints of those devices.

*********

Read some reviews:
http://babyworld.co.uk/reviews/cloudbabies-app/


It’s time to help the Cloudbabies look after the sky with this brand new, official app from Hoho Entertainment and Studio Liddell.

Based on themes in the TV series, the app is full of games and activities allowing children to have lots of fun with their favourite characters while bringing the Cloudbabies world into the palm of their hands.

Featuring quality video sequences and beautiful music this app can be enjoyed by all.

Nighting Time:
Help the Cloudbabies prepare for Nighting Time by collecting, tuning and delivering the shooting stars to Rainbow, ready to fling into the night sky.

Stitch and Sew:
Choosing from the show's bright and colourful characters, design your very own blanket with Baba Pink.

Plant and grow:
Baba Green needs help in the Sky Garden. Choose from Beanybean, Fluffigold and Poppitypop seeds to plant and grow.

Flutey Tunes:
Play along to some Cloudbabies' songs with Baba Yellow’s Fluteytoot.

Bobo's Big Race:
Help Bobo White drive the Sky Train and beat the Cloudbabies in a race to the finish line.

Cloud Bouncing:
Who’s the best cloud bouncer? Help each of the Cloudbabies and Bobo White to bounce as high as possible!

Also:
Change the time of day to see the beautiful sunset and night time skies

Earn and collect Cloudy Badges as you complete each game.

Playable on iPad 2 and better, iPad Mini, iPhone 4, 4s, 5, 5c, 5s.


We hope you enjoy our App, please try some other Studio Liddell Apps:

Poppy Cat (Party Treasure Hunt)
Little Charley Bear
Roary The Racing Car Rollin' Road
